title: Coronavirus: Don't use vodka to sanitise hands - BBC News
content: A rush on hand sanitiser to protect against the coronavirus has seen homemade versions spring up, including one based on a handmade vodka. But vodka maker Tito's quickly shot down a tweet suggesting the use of its spirits is strong enough for that purpose.
warning: Based on the content, title and advertisements on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
